option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <!-- Shadow Layer --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="#0D000000"/> <!-- 5% black shadow (0D in hex = 5% opacity) --> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> <!-- Main Background Layer, shifted slightly to create shadow effect --> <item android:top="2dp" android:bottom="2dp"> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@color/icon_backround"/> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> </layer-list>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/icon_backround">
<TextView android:id="@+id/appTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@color/icon_text" android:clickable="false" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:padding="7dp" android:text="Home" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/menuButton" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/menu_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/white" android:clickable="true" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/logo" android:layout_width="350dp" android:layout_height="350dp" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_zappas_burger_square" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/appTitle" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/placeOrderButton" android:layout_width="320dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_button_background" android:backgroundTint="@color/lettuce_green" android:elevation="4dp" android:paddingHorizontal="25dp" android:textAlignment="center" android:gravity="center" android:paddingVertical="15dp" android:text="Place Order" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="40sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?attr/selectableItemBackground" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/logo" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/otherTransactionsButton" android:layout_width="320dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_marginTop="13dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_button_background" android:elevation="4dp" android:paddingHorizontal="25dp" android:paddingVertical="15dp" android:text="Other Transactions" android:textAlignment="center" android:gravity="center" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="40sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?attr/selectableItemBackground" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/placeOrderButton" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/otherButton" android:layout_width="320dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_marginTop="13dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_button_background" android:backgroundTint="@color/tomato_red" android:elevation="4dp" android:paddingHorizontal="25dp" android:paddingVertical="15dp" android:text="Other" android:textAlignment="center" android:gravity="center" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="40sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?attr/selectableItemBackground" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/otherTransactionsButton" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:id="@+id/drawerLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<!-- Main Content --> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/icon_backround">
<TextView android:id="@+id/appTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@color/icon_text" android:clickable="false" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:padding="7dp" android:text="Home" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/menuButton" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/menu_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/white" android:clickable="true" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/logo" android:layout_width="350dp" android:layout_height="350dp" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_zappas_burger_square" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/appTitle" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/placeOrderButton" android:layout_width="320dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_button_background" android:backgroundTint="@color/lettuce_green" android:elevation="4dp" android:paddingHorizontal="25dp" android:textAlignment="center" android:gravity="center" android:paddingVertical="15dp" android:text="Place Order" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="40sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?attr/selectableItemBackground" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/logo" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/otherTransactionsButton" android:layout_width="320dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_marginTop="13dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_button_background" android:elevation="4dp" android:paddingHorizontal="25dp" android:paddingVertical="15dp" android:text="Other Transactions" android:textAlignment="center" android:gravity="center" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="40sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?attr/selectableItemBackground" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/placeOrderButton" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/otherButton" android:layout_width="320dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_marginTop="13dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_button_background" android:backgroundTint="@color/tomato_red" android:elevation="4dp" android:paddingHorizontal="25dp" android:paddingVertical="15dp" android:text="Other" android:textAlignment="center" android:gravity="center" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="40sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?attr/selectableItemBackground" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/otherTransactionsButton" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
<!-- Navigation Drawer --> <com.google.android.material.navigation.NavigationView android:id="@+id/navigationView" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_gravity="start" android:background="@color/white" app:headerLayout="@layout/nav_header" app:menu="@menu/nav_menu" />
</androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="176dp" android:background="@color/icon_text" android:gravity="bottom" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Dark">
<ImageView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="80dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_zappas_burger_square" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:paddingTop="8dp" android:text="Zappas Burger" android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Body1" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <group android:checkableBehavior="single"> <item android:id="@+id/nav_home" android:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_compass" android:title="Home" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_orders" android:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_recent_history" android:title="Orders" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_settings" android:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_manage" android:title="Settings" /> </group>
<item android:title="Other"> <menu> <item android:id="@+id/nav_about" android:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_info_details" android:title="About" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_help" android:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_help" android:title="Help" /> </menu> </item> </menu>
